text:
What's up everyone? Today we are 
learning English with an all-star cast

including David Schwimmer and ben 
stiller in the Dreamworks animation

Madagascar I like to move it move it I like 
to move and move it yeah I like to move it

I like to move it moving I like to move 
it move it I like to move it move it

In case you're new here we help you to learn fast 
English without getting lost without missing the

jokes and without subtitles, in fact, this new 
subscriber says that they never miss a lesson

and that they're improving their English 
skills so don't forget to hit that subscribe

button and the bell down below so that you 
don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Do you struggle to understand fast speaking 
natives and to understand all the jokes when

watching your favorite TV series or movies then 
I highly recommend our fluent with friends course

in this 48-week course you will learn 
with the first two seasons of Friends.

You'll receive PDF power lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle global community 
and so much more and the best part is you can

try it right now for free with our three-part 
Masterclass all you have to do is click up here

or down in the description box below to learn 
more and sign up now we hope to see you there!

If you're enjoying this lesson then you'll 
have a lot of fun learning with our lesson on

Ice Age, you can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that lesson next.
